<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Among the Will-O'-Wisps](/Articles.aspx?ID=36)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 58</row>

Learn the history and secrets of the malevolent and enigmatic [will-o'-wisps](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=210), who lead travelers to their doom!
name: Among the Will-O'-Wisps
